name: Appdi
tagline: An Application Driver helper library for Selenium. It encourages maintainability and readibility.
body:
# What is AppDi?
A helper library for Selenium.

Focus areas include:

-Maintainability and readiability
-Extended Page Object Pattern support
-Transparent Reporting

![Build Badge Placeholder](https://mavil.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/_apis/public/build/definitions/19319cdc-2a49-457c-bb5a-3f377d03af28/6/badge "Build Status")
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
